ygData.msgSnippet: hello there my name is lori and all of my char r under 10 but i can only play wen i am over my sis s house and that not , obviously, where i live sooooooo u
ygData.messageBody:
hello there my name is lori and all of my char r under 10 but i can only play wen i am over my sis's house and that not , obviously, where i live sooooooo u know!!! but very nice of u to do this and i play on fennin row, nameless, luclin, and stromm servers so if ur ever on those servers give me an email to let me know!! c ya'll later!!
 
lori

Donna <donna3923@...> wrote:
Hiya,
I just wanted to introduce myself.
My name is Donna. I play a 56 warrior on Bristlebane.
 
Be careful if your thinking of ordering Lost Dungeons of Norrath. Theres all kinds of problems with it. A fellow Guildie pre ordered it and last night when he got killed he deleveled 7 levels. Here's a link to the kind of problems everyone is having.
 
http://forum.magecompendium.com/tower/viewtopic.php?t=6050
 
I'm looking forward to meeting everyone.
donna
 

So.. Anyone pre-order Lost Dungeons of Norrath? And is anyone going to wait
to buy the storebought CD version that comes with a real life gift as well
as an in-game gift of an 8 slot weight reduction bag for one character?
luv,
-Su
